titleStmt.title: A brief discourse touching the office of Lord Chancellor of England written by the learned John Selden of the Inner Temple, Esq., and dedicated by him to Sir Francis Bacon ... ; transcribed from a true copy thereof, found amongst the collections of ... St. Lo. Kniveton ... ; together with A true catalogue of lord chancellors and keepers of the great seal of England, from the Norman conquest untill this present year, 1671, by William Dugdale, Esquire ...
titleStmt.author: Selden, John, 1584-1654.
Dugdale, William, Sir, 1605-1686. True catalogue of lord chancellors and keepers of the great seal of England.

notesStmt.note: On cover: Dugdale's Office of Lord Chancellor.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
